# include <iostream>
# include <cmath>
# include <cstdio>
# include <cstring>
using namespace std;

long long  dig(long long a, long long m, long long modulus){
	long long  result = 1;
	//a = a%modulus;
	while(m){
		if( m%2)
			result = (result*a)%modulus;
		m>>= 1;
		a = (a*a) % modulus;
	}
return result;
}

int main(){
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	for(int i = 0; i < t; i++){
		long long a;
		long long m;
		scanf("%lld %lld", &a, &m);
		printf("%lld\n", dig(a,m, 10));
	}
return 0;
}
